name: Freeway Template Bundle
summary: Learn about .FWTEMPLATEB files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: You can share your template bundle with other Freeway pro users and they can install your template bundle into Freeway Pro simply by double-clicking it. This allows other users to more easily use website layouts that other users have created.
NOTE: Freeway Pro also uses the more common .FWTB file for storing templates.

description: An FWTEMPLATEB file is a website template document bundle used by the Freeway Pro, a software app for creating websites without writing any code. It contains multiple website templates that can be shared with other Freeway Pro users as well. Each template website in the bundle contains information about the layout and appearance of the site.

Website document template bundle created and used by Freeway Pro, an app that allows users to create websites without having to write any code; contains one or more website templates, which includes information describing the layout and appearance of the site.
